mapper.select: select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_store t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_store t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and s.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_store t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where s.id = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
select count(*) from productbox_store t,productboxinfo s where t.status=0 and s.status=0
mapper.insert: insert into productbox_store (id, pid, count, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into productbox_store
id,
pid,
count,
status,

mapper.update:
update productbox_store
pid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productbox_store t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and s.status=0
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from productbox_store t,productboxinfo s where name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 and s.status=0
